an4.170:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma anando kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
an4.170:1.3: Tatra kho ayasma anando bhikkhu amantesi:
an4.170:1.5: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato anandassa paccassosum.
an4.170:2.1: “Yo hi koci, avuso, bhikkhu va bhikkhuni va mama santike arahattappattim byakaroti, sabbo so catuhi maggehi, etesam va annatarena.
an4.170:3.2: Idha, avuso, bhikkhu samathapubbangamam vipassanam bhaveti.
an4.170:3.3: Tassa samathapubbangamam vipassanam bhavayato maggo sanjayati.
an4.170:3.4: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
an4.170:3.5: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto samyojanani pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti.
an4.170:4.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu vipassanapubbangamam samatham bhaveti.
an4.170:4.2: Tassa vipassanapubbangamam samatham bhavayato maggo sanjayati.
an4.170:4.3: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
an4.170:4.4: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto samyojanani pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti.
an4.170:5.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu samathavipassanam yuganaddham bhaveti.
an4.170:5.2: Tassa samathavipassanam yuganaddham bhavayato maggo sanjayati.
an4.170:5.3: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
an4.170:5.4: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto samyojanani pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti.
an4.170:6.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhuno dhammuddhaccaviggahitam manasam hoti.
an4.170:6.2: Hoti so, avuso, samayo yam tam cittam ajjhattameva santitthati sannisidati ekodi hoti samadhiyati.
an4.170:6.4: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
an4.170:6.5: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto samyojanani pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti.
an4.170:7.1: Yo hi koci, avuso, bhikkhu va bhikkhuni va mama santike arahattappattim byakaroti, sabbo so imehi catuhi maggehi, etesam va annatarena”ti.
